is stepping down, to be replaced by founder Larry Page . Mr. Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman and will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers, broader business relationships and government outreach. Mr. Larry Page will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer.
